attributes.action: ban the use of all private cars
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition asks for the banning of the use of cars for private use, so taxis etc. would still be allowled. This will cut CO2 emmissions and reduce the effects of global warming. It will also create a better envirinment for all to live in with less noise, road deaths & fumes. Public transport should be massively improved to meet new demand created from this action.
